aka: Lucky Luke: Lucky Luke vs. Sherlock Holmes
this_title: "Les nouvelles aventures de Lucky Luke":Les Dalton contre Sherlock Holmes
trans_title: 幸运星卢克大战福尔摩斯
Lucky Luke: Lucky Luke vs. Sherlock Holmes
introduction: When queen Victoria visits president Grant, the old and new world leaders brag and sneer, ending up to bet who can catch the Daltons first, her P.I. Sherlock Holmes or U.S. top-sleuth Lucky Luke. While the champions with opposite manners and methods play fair, Victoria follows in a cart with two guardsmen, which she orders to sabotage Lucky. Just when she snatches up Sherlock to rebuke him, that gets the whole British party kidnapped by the Daltons..
chinese_title: 幸运星卢克大战福尔摩斯
foreign_title: "Les nouvelles aventures de Lucky Luke":Les Dalton contre Sherlock Holmes
